#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    float t,o,i,r,s,runs,balls;
    float nrr;
    scanf("%f",&t);
    for(i=1;i<=t;i++)
    {
        scanf("%f%f%f",&o,&r,&s);
        balls=o*6;
        runs=(r*balls)/6;
        
        balls+=6;
        runs+=s;
        nrr= (runs*6)/balls;
        printf("%.2f\n",nrr);
    }
    return 0;
}
